primary.context: Customer cannot afford the current payment amount and needs a payment plan
primary.detail: The caller requested a payment arrangement which is out of scope; the AI attempted a transfer, but the queue was unavailable.

steps: Caller requested a representative for customer service.
AI asked for more details to assist.
Caller explained they need to split a payment over several months.
AI identified the request as needing a live agent and warned of wait times.
AI initiated transfer to concierge queue.
Transfer failed after several minutes of hold music due to no agents being available.

impediment.detail: The transfer queue was unavailable and the AI re-engaged to tell the caller to call back later.

actions.detail: Attempted transfer to concierge for payment arrangement request.

insights.summary: The customer wanted to set up a payment plan to split their fees over several months. The AI correctly identified this as out of scope and attempted a transfer, but no agents were available in the queue.
insights.verbatim: I would like to talk to a person that can help me to split this payment in more months.
